content:
Multiple URI/URL per resource (2)

  • Does the draft distinguish between URI/URL and resource correctly?
    • Resolution: The draft was changed so that URI/URL and resource are properly distinguished so its clear when requirements affect URI/URL, and when they affect resources.
  • Open issues:
    • Discussion of collections can use some work to make intent more clear.
    • Others?
